DOC.brief_summary: The goal integrate project target Childhood Obesity Prevention Challenge Area reduce prevalence obesity among child attend Head Start Michigan . The propose intervention program base Social Cognitive theory premise enhance child 's capacity emotional behavioral self-regulation key component effective obesity prevention . A randomized controlled trial design propose evaluate , among 600 Head Start child parent , effectiveness 2 approach obesity prevention : ( 1 ) Parents Preschoolers Prevention Series ( POPS ) , curriculum deliver preschooler parent focus obesity-related health behavior ; ( 2 ) POPS combination Incredible Years Series ( IYS ) , evidence-based program design improve preschooler ' emotional behavioral self-regulation . The research objective test hypothesis : ( 1 ) POPS , compare Usual Head Start exposure , lead great improvement obesity-related health behavior adiposity index ; ( 2 ) POPS + IYS lead great improvement obesity-related health behavior adiposity index , effect mediate improved self-regulation . The extension objective evaluate feasibility , fidelity , educational effectiveness POPS POPS + IYS intervention , deliver paraprofessional educator within Extension Head Start . The education objective provide Extension Head Start staff non-formal training educational curriculum widely disseminate . The long-term goal project disseminate novel effective approach obesity prevention preschooler .
